title: All-new RAAW Jibb mid-travel 29er trail bike looks primed for throwing shapes
content:
An all-new mid-travel mountain bike has joined the Madonna in the RAAW roster. The Jibb boasts the same suspension layout as its longer travel sibling, benefiting from that monster main pivot, but in a more compact 135mm travel package. Refined to deliver the more playful, interactive ride feel of a trail bike, the RAAW Jibb […]

The post All-new RAAW Jibb mid-travel 29er trail bike looks primed for throwing shapes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
